# reset

Resets the iterator to the beginning of the collection, as if it had just been created.

## Declaration

```swift
virtual void reset() = 0; 
```

## Overview

Subclasses must implement this pure virtual member function.

## Miscellaneous

- **getNextObject**: Advances to and returns the next object in the iteration.
- **isValid**: Check that the collection hasn't been modified during iteration.
